name: The Mummy's Last Walk
description:
You wake up outside of your home. The pyramid is wide open and for some strange reason your head is lost.

The Mummy's Last Walk is a top-down-adventure game where you trying to go deeper into the pyramid to find your way back to your family. 

Use your head to platform, swing and bounce your way through a lot of different challenges!



- Explore a pyramid full of traps and mysteries
- Learn new abilites to traverse and solve puzzles
- Find secrets and untangle what has happen to you and your family



Game is playable with both a keyboard or a controller.

You will gather new abilites as you progress, so not all abillites that are listed below are available at the start. The gifs on the side showcase some of the actions the mummy can perform.




Game made by: Sebastian Lind
 Testers: Simon Lind, Florence Rick, Simon Bothen Game made in: DOME by Aviv Beeri
Music by: Kevin MacLeod (see music_attribution.txt for all the music used)
